customers are expecting more from brands and online stores the rise in online sales and the availability of multichannel choices demonstrated to customers that there is a better, more practical way to shop however, consumers want more from their shopping experience than just convenience—they want it to be fun and unique this section allows the admin to manage their front store offering amazing customer experience
